message.content:
1. The PPV/CPA arm showed significantly better progression-free survival.
2. The median progression-free survival time for the PPV/CPA arm was 6.1 months.
3. The median progression-free survival time for the PPV alone arm was 2.9 months.
4. The hazard ratio for progression-free survival was 0.427.
5. The P-value for the difference in progression-free survival was 0.008.
6. The PPV/CPA arm also showed significantly better overall survival.
7. The median overall survival time for the PPV/CPA arm was 12.1 months.
8. The median overall survival time for the PPV alone arm was 5.9 months.
9. The hazard ratio for overall survival was 0.376.
10. The P-value for the difference in overall survival was 0.004.

messages.content:
Statement: The PPV/CPA arm showed significantly better progression‐free survival (median time: 6.1 vs 2.9 months; hazard ratio (HR): 0.427; P = 0.008) and overall survival (median time: 12.1 vs 5.9 months; HR: 0.376; P = 0.004), compared to the PPV alone arm.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
